DOC.brief_title: Magnitude Changes 25 OH Vitamin D3 Levels After Vitamin D3 Supplementation
DOC.criteria: Adults live Riyadh area consume one serving milk/day , take vitamin supplement , habitually less 10 hr sun exposure per week , n't suffer granulomatous condition , liver disease , kidney disease , n't take anticonvulsant , barbiturate , steroid . Individuals total 25 OH vitamin D level exceed 100 nmol/l exclude study . Individuals 25 OH vitamin D level less 20 nmol/L exclude placebo arm .
